name: The Galactic Coliseum
description:
The Galactic Coliseum is a 3D Turn-Based Fighter, in which players can currently choose from five unique fighters, each scrupulously balanced and with a different playing style. Each character has their own attacks, as well as passive traits and formidable skills that can turn the tide of a battle. As a result, no fighter is out of the duel till the very end.

Join warriors from across the Galaxy as they gather at the Galactic Embassy to prove their worth!
